summary: An ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of Villard and Harvard, et al, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 3967 creating Local Improvement District No. 113, and authorizing the city treasurer to prepare a tabulated statement showing the amounts of the refunds due on lots and parcels of land in said assessment district and the name of the person paying such assessments and appropriating out of the special fund of said local improvement district, the amounts necessary to pay such refunds, and authorizing and directing the mayor and city comptroller to draw warrants on such special fund in favor of the persons paying such assessments for the several amounts due such payors, as shown by said tabulated statement, and authorizing the city treasurer to pay said warrants out of said special fund and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
